content.description: Start where the trail touches the rock and traverse around the rock (I went around to the right) as you please.

This rock is right off of the trail. There are a lot of easy, uneventful ways to get to the top. It is a great spot for some inexperienced climbers or people trying to get into the sport.

 Update as of June 2019:

 I am of the opinion that Hangout Rock has been moved and made unsafe by the bulldozing of Bear Hill. Based on the GPS location for hangout rock, a road had been cut by heavy machinery right through where it should be (and the surrounding area). Walking around, I believe to have found it about 100-150m away from its marked location, but it has been buried in a dirt pile.
